## SDQ vs BAPQ

Both the Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire (SDQ) and Broad Autism Phenotype Questionnaire (BAPQ) are integral tools within the field of psychology research. However, comparing these tools manually can be a laborious and highly subjective process. With the SDQ's focus on assessing behavioural aspects in youth and the BAPQ's concentration on autism related characteristics in individuals, direct comparisons can seem beyond reach. Through the Harmony software, researchers can streamline the process of 'SDQ vs BAPQ' comparison in an insightful and data-driven manner. Harmony is a powerful tool developed for psychologists that leverages advanced natural language processing technologies and generative AI models. Harmony can automatically compare and match different items in the SDQ and BAPQ, even across different languages. By using Harmony, psychologists can gain insights into how questions in SDQ relate to those in BAPQ. This way, the 'SDQ vs BAPQ' comparison becomes a data-driven endeavor, taking away the tedious subjectivity that often accompanies manual comparisons of questionnaires. By leveraging the capabilities of Harmony, the process of 'SDQ vs BAPQ' can no longer remain a daunting task. The software's large language model permits comparison of questionnaires with a percentage match, giving researchers the opportunity to validate the consistencies and differences across studies. Whether you are aiming to draw inferences within a study or test results across different researches, Harmony brings the power of AI to your disposal. Upgrade your research approach today with the power of Harmony in 'SDQ vs BAPQ' comparison.

## Compare the items in SDQ and BAPQ

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import SDQ and BAPQ into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just SDQ into Harmony</a> - compare SDQ with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just BAPQ into Harmony</a> - compare BAPQ with other instruments
